name: Secrets are Messy Like Omelettes
description:
秘密はオムレツのように乱雑です

~SECRETS ARE MESSY LIKE OMELETS~

Sometimes life is about going fast.  What happens if you take the time, slow down, and fall in love?

When she first walked onto the Angel Island Academy campus the Fates whispered to her and she felt the winds of change.  Tag along with bubbly pal Kocha and make life-altering choices as you explore the world of EDM, hang out at cat cafés and attend the mysterious Emerald Festival.  Who knows, maybe you will meet someone who shifts your reality forever.

“A Visual Novel adventure made for the age of the internet.”

“‘Secrets are Messy Like Omelettes’ is a gaming experience like no other: you will laugh, you will cry, you will ask yourself ‘why?’ A must-play.”

DOWNLOAD CONTAINS: Game for Windows and Mac OSX.
